trans-unit.source: Provides a list by function of some of the controls that you can use in your apps.
trans-unit.target: Provides a list by function of some of the controls that you can use in your apps.

trans-unit.source: The XAML UI framework for Windows provides an extensive library of controls that support UI development.
trans-unit.target: The XAML UI framework for Windows provides an extensive library of controls that support UI development.

trans-unit.source: Some of these controls have a visual representation; others function as the containers for other controls or content, such as images and media.
trans-unit.target: Some of these controls have a visual representation; others function as the containers for other controls or content, such as images and media.

trans-unit.source: You can see many of the Windows UI controls in action by downloading the [**XAML UI Basics sample**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619992).
trans-unit.target: You can see many of the Windows UI controls in action by downloading the [**XAML UI Basics sample**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619992).

trans-unit.source: Here's a list by function of the common XAML controls you can use in your app.
trans-unit.target: Here's a list by function of the common XAML controls you can use in your app.

trans-unit.source: A toolbar for displaying application-specific commands.
trans-unit.target: A toolbar for displaying application-specific commands.

trans-unit.source: A button for showing commands using app bar styling.
trans-unit.target: A button for showing commands using app bar styling.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [App bar and command bar control guide](app-bars.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [App bar and command bar control guide](app-bars.md)

trans-unit.source: Visually separates groups of commands in a command bar.
trans-unit.target: Visually separates groups of commands in a command bar.

trans-unit.source: A button for toggling commands in a command bar.
trans-unit.target: A button for toggling commands in a command bar.

trans-unit.source: A specialized app bar that handles the resizing of app bar button elements.
trans-unit.target: A specialized app bar that handles the resizing of app bar button elements.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [App bar and command bar control guide](app-bars.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [App bar and command bar control guide](app-bars.md)

trans-unit.source: A control that responds to user input and raises a **Click** event.
trans-unit.target: A control that responds to user input and raises a **Click** event.

trans-unit.source: A button that appears as marked up text and opens the specified URI in a browser.
trans-unit.target: A button that appears as marked up text and opens the specified URI in a browser.

trans-unit.source: A button that raises its **Click** event repeatedly from the time it's pressed until it's released.
trans-unit.target: A button that raises its **Click** event repeatedly from the time it's pressed until it's released.

trans-unit.source: A control that presents a collection of items that the user can flip through, one item at a time.
trans-unit.target: A control that presents a collection of items that the user can flip through, one item at a time.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Flip view control guide](flipview.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Flip view control guide](flipview.md)

trans-unit.source: A control that presents a collection of items in rows and columns that can scroll horizontally.
trans-unit.target: A control that presents a collection of items in rows and columns that can scroll horizontally.

trans-unit.source: A control that presents a collection of items in a UI specified by a data template.
trans-unit.target: A control that presents a collection of items in a UI specified by a data template.

trans-unit.source: A control that presents a collection of items in a list that can scroll vertically.
trans-unit.target: A control that presents a collection of items in a list that can scroll vertically.

trans-unit.source: A control that lets a user select a date using a drop-down calendar display.
trans-unit.target: A control that lets a user select a date using a drop-down calendar display.

trans-unit.source: A calendar date picker with open calendar view
trans-unit.target: A calendar date picker with open calendar view

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Calendar, date, and time controls](date-and-time.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Calendar, date, and time controls](date-and-time.md)

trans-unit.source: A configurable calendar display that lets a user select single or multiple dates.
trans-unit.target: A configurable calendar display that lets a user select single or multiple dates.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Calendar, date, and time controls](date-and-time.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Calendar, date, and time controls](date-and-time.md)

trans-unit.source: A control that lets a user select a date.
trans-unit.target: A control that lets a user select a date.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Calendar, date, and time controls](date-and-time.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Calendar, date, and time controls](date-and-time.md)

trans-unit.source: A control that lets a user set a time value.
trans-unit.target: A control that lets a user set a time value.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Calendar, date, and time controls](date-and-time.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Calendar, date, and time controls](date-and-time.md)

trans-unit.source: See Menu flyout and Popup menu.
trans-unit.target: See Menu flyout and Popup menu.

trans-unit.source: Displays a message that requires user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Displays a message that requires user interaction.

trans-unit.source: (Unlike a dialog, a flyout does not create a separate window, and does not block other user interaction.)
trans-unit.target: (Unlike a dialog, a flyout does not create a separate window, and does not block other user interaction.)

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Context menus and dialogs](dialogs-popups-menus.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Context menus and dialogs](dialogs-popups-menus.md)

trans-unit.source: Temporarily displays a list of commands or options related to what the user is currently doing.
trans-unit.target: Temporarily displays a list of commands or options related to what the user is currently doing.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Context menus and dialogs](dialogs-popups-menus.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Context menus and dialogs](dialogs-popups-menus.md)

trans-unit.source: A custom menu that presents commands that you specify.
trans-unit.target: A custom menu that presents commands that you specify.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Context menus and dialogs](dialogs-popups-menus.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Context menus and dialogs](dialogs-popups-menus.md)

trans-unit.source: A pop-up window that displays information for an element.
trans-unit.target: A pop-up window that displays information for an element.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: Guidelines for tooltips
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: Guidelines for tooltips

trans-unit.source: A control that presents an image.
trans-unit.target: A control that presents an image.

trans-unit.source: A control that receives and displays ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: A control that receives and displays ink strokes.

trans-unit.source: Various retained mode graphical objects that can be presented like ellipses, rectangles, lines, Bezier paths, etc.
trans-unit.target: Various retained mode graphical objects that can be presented like ellipses, rectangles, lines, Bezier paths, etc.

trans-unit.source: A container control that draws a border, background, or both, around another object.
trans-unit.target: A container control that draws a border, background, or both, around another object.

trans-unit.source: A layout panel that supports the absolute positioning of child elements relative to the top left corner of the canvas.
trans-unit.target: A layout panel that supports the absolute positioning of child elements relative to the top left corner of the canvas.

trans-unit.source: A layout panel that supports the arranging of child elements in rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: A layout panel that supports the arranging of child elements in rows and columns.

trans-unit.source: A panel that lets you position and align child objects in relation to each other or the parent panel.
trans-unit.target: A panel that lets you position and align child objects in relation to each other or the parent panel.

trans-unit.source: You don't typically use it as a stand-alone control.)
trans-unit.target: You don't typically use it as a stand-alone control.)

trans-unit.source: A container control that lets the user pan and zoom its content.
trans-unit.target: A container control that lets the user pan and zoom its content.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Scroll and panning controls guide](scroll-controls.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Scroll and panning controls guide](scroll-controls.md)

trans-unit.source: Sample code: [XAML scrolling, panning and zooming sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=238577)
trans-unit.target: Sample code: [XAML scrolling, panning and zooming sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=238577)

trans-unit.source: A layout panel that arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: A layout panel that arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.

trans-unit.source: A layout panel that supports the arranging of child elements in rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: A layout panel that supports the arranging of child elements in rows and columns.

trans-unit.source: Each child element can span multiple rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: Each child element can span multiple rows and columns.

trans-unit.source: Variable sized wrap grid layout panel
trans-unit.target: Variable sized wrap grid layout panel

trans-unit.source: A container control that scales its content to a specified size.
trans-unit.target: A container control that scales its content to a specified size.

trans-unit.source: A control that plays audio and video content.
trans-unit.target: A control that plays audio and video content.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Media element control guide](media-playback.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Media element control guide](media-playback.md)

trans-unit.source: A control that provides playback controls for a MediaElement.
trans-unit.target: A control that provides playback controls for a MediaElement.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Media element control guide](media-playback.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Media element control guide](media-playback.md)

trans-unit.source: A container control that lets the user view and navigate to different sections of content.
trans-unit.target: A container control that lets the user view and navigate to different sections of content.

trans-unit.source: A full-screen container and navigation model that also provides a quick way to move between different pivots (views or filters), typically in the same set of data.
trans-unit.target: A full-screen container and navigation model that also provides a quick way to move between different pivots (views or filters), typically in the same set of data.

trans-unit.source: The Pivot control can be styled to have a "tab" layout.
trans-unit.target: The Pivot control can be styled to have a "tab" layout.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Tabs and pivot control guide](tabs-pivot.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Tabs and pivot control guide](tabs-pivot.md)

trans-unit.source: A container control that lets the user zoom between two views of a collection of items.
trans-unit.target: A container control that lets the user zoom between two views of a collection of items.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Semantic zoom control guide](semantic-zoom.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Semantic zoom control guide](semantic-zoom.md)

trans-unit.source: Sample code: [XAML GridView grouping and SemanticZoom sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=226564)
trans-unit.target: Sample code: [XAML GridView grouping and SemanticZoom sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=226564)

trans-unit.source: A container control with two views; one view for the main content and another view that is typically used for a navigation menu.
trans-unit.target: A container control with two views; one view for the main content and another view that is typically used for a navigation menu.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Split view control guide](split-view.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Split view control guide](split-view.md)

trans-unit.source: A container control that hosts web content.
trans-unit.target: A container control that hosts web content.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: Guidelines for Web views
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: Guidelines for Web views

trans-unit.source: A control that indicates progress by displaying a bar.
trans-unit.target: A control that indicates progress by displaying a bar.

trans-unit.source: A progress bar that shows a specific value.
trans-unit.target: A progress bar that shows a specific value.

trans-unit.source: A progress bar that shows indeterminate progress.
trans-unit.target: A progress bar that shows indeterminate progress.

trans-unit.source: A control that indicates indeterminate progress by displaying a ring.
trans-unit.target: A control that indicates indeterminate progress by displaying a ring.

trans-unit.source: A text input box that provides suggested text as the user types.
trans-unit.target: A text input box that provides suggested text as the user types.

trans-unit.source: An auto suggest box for search
trans-unit.target: An auto suggest box for search

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Auto suggest box control guide](auto-suggest-box.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Auto suggest box control guide](auto-suggest-box.md)

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Password box control guide](password-box.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Password box control guide](password-box.md)

trans-unit.source: Sample code: [XAML text display sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=238579), [XAML text editing sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=251417)
trans-unit.target: Sample code: [XAML text display sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=238579), [XAML text editing sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=251417)

trans-unit.source: A control that lets a user edit rich text documents with content like formatted text, hyperlinks, and images.
trans-unit.target: A control that lets a user edit rich text documents with content like formatted text, hyperlinks, and images.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Rich edit box control guide](rich-edit-box.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Rich edit box control guide](rich-edit-box.md)

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Text block control guide](text-block.md), [Rich text block control guide](rich-text-block.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Text block control guide](text-block.md), [Rich text block control guide](rich-text-block.md)

trans-unit.source: A single-line or multi-line plain text field.
trans-unit.target: A single-line or multi-line plain text field.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Text box control guide](text-box.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Text controls](text-controls.md), [Text box control guide](text-box.md)

trans-unit.source: A control that a user can select or clear.
trans-unit.target: A control that a user can select or clear.

trans-unit.source: The 3 states of a check box
trans-unit.target: The 3 states of a check box

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Check box control guide](checkbox.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Check box control guide](checkbox.md)

trans-unit.source: A drop-down list of items a user can select from.
trans-unit.target: A drop-down list of items a user can select from.

trans-unit.source: A control that presents an inline list of items that the user can select from.
trans-unit.target: A control that presents an inline list of items that the user can select from.

trans-unit.source: A control that allows a user to select a single option from a group of options.
trans-unit.target: A control that allows a user to select a single option from a group of options.

trans-unit.source: When radio buttons are grouped together, they are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: When radio buttons are grouped together, they are mutually exclusive.

trans-unit.source: Design and how-to: [Radio button control guide](radio-button.md)
trans-unit.target: Design and how-to: [Radio button control guide](radio-button.md)

trans-unit.source: A control that lets the user select from a range of values by moving a Thumb control along a track.
trans-unit.target: A control that lets the user select from a range of values by moving a Thumb control along a track.

trans-unit.source: A button that can be toggled between 2 states.
trans-unit.target: A button that can be toggled between 2 states.

trans-unit.source: A switch that can be toggled between 2 states.
trans-unit.target: A switch that can be toggled between 2 states.
